colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B ('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAG PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GAN MO'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE TSE RIGS @014A *, ,PA NI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LO BSGYUR BA CHINGS GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AE HAS DANG, DGOS RTZI RIGS PA'I BLO GROS RGYAL BA'I AA CHE THU DAR HANG THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BUS SKU TSE RGYAL MTSAN BSTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I @014B SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA SOGS SEMS CAN GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,) BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
